name: THE GREENBRIER COMPANIES
description: Supplier of transportation equipment and services to the railroad industry.
sampleDescriptions: Monitoring of bonus depreciation. Tax reform legislation - opposition to the Border Adjustment Tax.
Railroad tankcar safety requirements; lobby against legislation relating to large truck proposals.
Monitor legislation regarding the expansion of the use of longer and heavier trucks; lobby against legislation relating to large truck proposals.
Monitoring developments relating to the NAFTA renegotiation and legislation relating to trade with China.
Railroad tankcar safety requirements; lobby against legislation relating to large truck proposals.
